name: 'For Painting'
description: TITLE: ‘FOR painting’ MEDIUM: oil on canvas with mounted digital printout on paper, 2007, 60” x 47 3/4”, 152.4×121.2 cm, 14 oz cotton artist’s canvas, stretched on artist’s stretcher bar frame. Signed and dated by artist on the front lower right: SM 2007, Signed and dated on reverse: Scotto, SM 11/23/07. Colors include: cerulean blue, cadmium yellow deep and verde green. Unframed.

name: 'FOUND Painting #1'
description: TITLE: ‘FOUND painting #1’ MEDIUM: oil on found digital photograph mounted on masonite, 2007, 39 3/4” x 29 3/4”, 100.96×75.56 cm. Signed and dated by artist on the front lower right: SM 2007, Signed and dated on reverse: Scotto, SM 9/10/07. Colors include: cerulean blue, light blue, indian red, vandyke brown and verde green. Framed: Natural poplar wood ¾” x 1 ½”.

name: ‘FOUND painting #2’
description: TITLE: ‘FOUND painting #2’ MEDIUM: oil on found digital photograph mounted on masonite, 2007, 39 3/4” x 29 3/4”, 100.96×75.56 cm. Signed and dated by artist on the front lower left: SM 2007, Signed and dated on reverse: Scotto, SM 9/10/07. Colors include: light blue, vandyke brown, cadmium yellow deep, magenta, and lambs black Framed: Natural poplar wood ¾” x 1 ½”.

name: ‘FOUND painting #6’
description: TITLE: ‘FOUND painting #6’ MEDIUM: oil on found digital photograph mounted on masonite, 2007, 39 3/4” x 29 3/4”, 100.96×75.56 cm. Signed and dated by artist on the front lower center: SM 2007, Signed and dated on reverse: Scotto, SM 9/10/07. Colors include: cerulean blue, vandyke brown, lambs black and verde green. Framed: Natural poplar wood ¾” x 1 ½”.

name: ‘FOUND painting #8’
description: TITLE: ‘FOUND painting #8’ MEDIUM: oil on found digital photograph mounted on masonite, 2007, 39 3/4” x 29 3/4”, 100.96×75.56 cm. Signed and dated by artist on the front lower right: SM 2007, Signed and dated on reverse: Scotto, SM 9/10/07. Colors include: light blue, indian red, vandyke brown, raw umber, cadmium yellow deep, and lambs black. Framed: Natural poplar wood ¾” x 1 ½”.
